data.title: Legends of the Sea
data.meta_description: Legends of the Sea is the name of a Bilge Rat Adventure released as part of the January 2020 Legends of the Seas update for Sea of Thieves. The Adventure takes Players to Lagoon of Whispers where Umbra has set camp and is collecting Tales of Legendary Adventurers, that are immortalised all over The Sea of Thieves, in exchange for unique Tattoos in honour of these legends.
data.text:
This article is about the Bilge Rat Adventure. For the Content Update, see Legends of the Sea (Content Update).

Legends of the Sea is the name of a Bilge Rat Adventure released as part of the January 2020 Legends of the Seas update for Sea of Thieves. The Adventure takes Players to Lagoon of Whispers where Umbra has set camp and is collecting Tales of Legendary Adventurers, that are immortalised all over The Sea of Thieves, in exchange for unique Tattoos in honour of these legends.

Summary

Umbra has appeared in The Sea of Thieves on Lagoon of Whispers, chronicling stories of various Legendary Player Pirates to have left their marks here. With the Legends of the Sea (Content Update), every major Easter Egg in Sea of Thieves has been made interactive. Once inspected, they provide the story behind these in-game immortalisations along with Commendations, which unlock various unique themed Tattoos for purchase from Umbra. The locations of the Easter Eggs are hinted at in the Legends of the Sea tab under the Bilge Rats Commendation menu. Additionally, Umbra has left 10 Journals all across The Sea of Thieves documenting the changes to Sea of Thieves in past Bilge Rat Adventures.

Journals

Lagoon of Whispers Journals

There are three Journals on Lagoon of Whispers written by Umbra that tell of her story and motivations. Note that these Journals have no Commendations tied to them, they just provide background to how Umbra made it to The Sea of Thieves.

Legends of the Sea Journals

There are 10 numbered Journals written by Umbra hidden in specific locations related to past Content Updates, chronicling the changes made by those events. These books have Commendations tied to them, rewarding Doubloons upon first reading them.

The Legend of Glitterbeard Journals

Easter Eggs

Main article: Easter Eggs

The Easter Eggs are categorised into 10 groups, each group consisting of 5 stories of Legendary Pirates from across The Sea of Thieves. Upon interacting with these Easter Eggs, player will receive Commendations and can unlock special Tattoos for purchase from Umbra.

For a list of all the immortalisations, see Easter Eggs.

For a map of all the Easter Egg locations, players can visit the RareThief Interactive Sea of Thieves Map and check the boxes under Legends of the Sea.

Tattoos

After completing all the Commendations in each group of Easter Eggs, players will unlock unique themed Tattoo sets for purchase from Umbra:

Umbra’s Chronicle Tattoo Set - 12,150 - This curious set of intertwining tattoos tells the most important tales that Umbra has uncovered.

The Sea’s Most Wanted Tattoo Set - 12,150 - These tattoos honour some of the most felonious pirates to blight the Sea of Thieves!

The Daredevils Tattoo Set - 12,150 - For those pirates who love nothing more than to take ridiculous risks.

The Loveable Rogues Tattoo Set - 12,150 - Some pirates end up being so popular, it really warms the heart. Even more than a firebomb.

The Insatiable Tattoo Set - 12,150 - This tattoo set commemorates some of the greediest pirates ever, in food and gold.

The Swashbucklers Tattoo Set - 12,150 - We must remember those pirates who really got their teeth into the business, for better or worse.

The Artistic Souls Tattoo Set - 12,150 - Between fighting and looting, some pirates have earned great respect by painting and drawing.

The Piratical Jokers Tattoo Set - 12,150 - These tattoos remind us that a pirate with a sense of humour will always raise their crew’s spirits.

The Pirate Scribes Tattoo Set - 12,150 - Some pirates love to write, once they’ve learned how to. These tattoos honour their work.

The Gift Givers Tattoo Set - 12,150 - Remember the most generous pirates of our times and seek to uphold their kindness.

The Early Settlers Tattoo Set - 12,150 - Once the Pirate Lord showed the way, a few notorious pirates came and made their marks here.

133,650 Gold Total

Commendations

The following are all the Commendations related to Legends of the Sea:

Legends of the Sea Books:

CommendationsImageCommendationRequirementsRewardsA Living HistoryFind Umbra on the Lagoon of Whispers and begin uncovering the tales of legendary pirates.+5

Legends of the Sea IFind Umbra's book on Devil's Ridge, overlooking the sea.+5

Legends of the Sea IIFind Umbra's book on Crescent Isle, where Salty once rested.+5

Unlocks Sunshine Parrot Set items for purchase.Legends of the Sea IIIFind Umbra's book on The Devil's Thirst, at a small camp.+5

Legends of the Sea IVFind Umbra's book on The Crooked Masts, under a Beacon's light.+5

Legends of the Sea VFind Umbra's book on Kraken's Fall, near a camp to the north-east and the remains of a Kraken.+5

Legends of the Sea VIFind Umbra's book in the Pirate Legend Hideout, safely shelved away.+5

Legends of the Sea VIIFind Umbra's book on Hidden Spring Keep, overlooking the fort.+5

Legends of the Sea VIIIFind Umbra's book on Shipwreck Bay, tucked away inside a wreck.+5

Legends of the Sea IXFind Umbra's book at the Wild Treasures Store, a Seapost out in The Wilds.+5

Legends of the Sea XFind Umbra's book in the Fort of the Damned, discussing the supernatural.+5

Umbra's ObservationsDiscover all of Umbra's Journals.+25

The Sea's Most Wanted:

CommendationsImageCommendationRequirementsRewardsThe Fox in the SnakeHave a drink in the tavern at Dagger Tooth and you're sure to learn of this deadly pirate.+5

Missing, Presumed PiratingNear the central rock of Lone Cove, a poster remains for a missing pirate.+5

Self-Promoting Pistol PirateDagger Tooth is known for deadly criminals, as a poster on the water tower suggests.+5

Join the ClubOn Mermaid's Hideaway, a popular pirate created a social spot overlooking the sea.+5

Nice to be WantedA popular pirate took refuge near some building remains, on an island in the Shores of Plenty.+5

The Sea's Most WantedComplete all Commendations within this collection. (5)+25

Unlocks The Sea's Most Wanted Tattoo Set for purchase in Umbra's Tattoo Outlet.

The Daredevils:

CommendationsImageCommendationRequirementsRewardsSleeping with the FishesThey say a pirate met his fate on the shores of Mermaid's Hideaway.+5

Aim HighOn Plunder Outpost, a pirate who liked high places came to rest in a hard-to-reach spot.+5

...And Not a Drop Spilled.The tavern at Ancient Spire Outpost has an unusual sign dedicated to an unusual pirate.+5

Not All Falcons FlyOn Shipwreck Bay, they say a pirate's bones can be found beside a Legendary Shipwreck.+5

Run AgroundOn Salty Sands, a moment when shark triumphed over pirate was captured in art.+5

The DaredevilsComplete all Commendations within this collection. (5)+25

Unlocks The Daredevils Tattoo Set for purchase in Umbra's Tattoo Outlet.

The Loveable Rogues:

CommendationsImageCommendationRequirementsRewardsNot Just For SweepingThere must be a story behind this unusual tavern sign on Sanctuary Outpost.+5

Bound by a BookOn Smuggler's Bay, in a dark cave, a talented pair left one of their legendary creations.+5

Snake CharmerA famous reptile lover spends their time on an appropriately named island, atop a central shine.+5

Dog DaysThere is a hidden camp on Mermaid's Hideaway, made by a popular pirate.+5

Pirate Port PalsTwo talkative pirates left their tankards on an Outpost made of golden sand, a perfect spot to chat.+5

The Loveable RoguesComplete all Commendations within this collection. (5)+25

Unlocks The Loveable Rogues Tattoo Set for purchase in Umbra's Tattoo Outlet.

The Insatiable:

CommendationsImageCommendationRequirementsRewardsDeath by BananaThis pirate lost their way on the beach of Marauder's Arch, and tried to survive on just bananas...+5

ZZ Marks the SpotA tavern regular at Plunder Outpost became part of the furniture.+5

Going BananasWord tells of an unusual barrel on Sanctuary Outpost, near the water tower.+5

Famously FrugalIn Lost Gold Fort in The Ancient Isles, a list honours the greediest of pirates...+5

A Hairy LegacyShow Umbra the Legacy Beard by speaking to her while wearing it.+5

The InsatiableComplete all Commendations within this collection. (5)+25

Unlocks The Insatiable Tattoo Set for purchase in Umbra's Tattoo Outlet.

The Swashbucklers:

CommendationsImageCommendationRequirementsRewardsWide of the MarkA pirate with dubious aim left an unmarked target atop Smuggler's Bay.+5

Precision PiratingThe Weaponsmith's Shop on Galleon's Grave boasts a famous patron.+5

Legendary LarcenyOn Smuggler's Bay lived a pirate famed for his stolen hoard. He left a mark on the Southwest Beach.+5

Buckets of FunUmbra heard that on Sanctuary Outpost, a tireless worker’s bucket was proudly hung on display.+5

A Venomous AttackThey say that Shark Fin Camp was once defeated by very unusual means.+5

The SwashbucklersComplete all Commendations within this collection. (5)+25

Unlocks The Swashbucklers Tattoo Set for purchase in Umbra's Tattoo Outlet.

The Artistic Souls:

CommendationsImageCommendationRequirementsRewardsA Musical FamilyAncient Spire Outpost played host to a kind and gifted musician, who later sold her instrument.+5

Still LifeSanctuary Outpost is a beautiful place. Rumour has it the tavern hosts some legendary art.+5

Dressed to ImpressIn the tavern at Ancient Spire Outpost, there is a painting of four very fancy pirates.+5

Through The Eyes of a ChildA young cartographer was known to hone their skills at a camp on Smuggler's Bay.+5

Pirates in PortraitOn Sailor's Bounty, a set of portraits by a talented pirate await delivery.+5

The Artistic SoulsComplete all Commendations within this collection. (5)+25

Unlocks the Maestro Set for purchase and The Artistic Souls Tattoo Set for purchase in Umbra's Tattoo Outlet.

The Piratical Jokers:

CommendationsImageCommendationRequirementsRewardsMerrick RollRumours speak of an odd book left at The Reaper's Hideout... could be a dangerous campsite to visit.+5

Killer QualificationsOn Port Merrick, filling your crew is easy when the pirates advertise in the tavern.+5

Dances with ChickensRumour has it that a strange scene was painted on a large rock on Chicken Isle.+5

Familial ResemblanceThey say that where Merrick once camped on Shark Bait Cove, his son now displays a portrait.+5

Purply PrettyShow Umbra the Amethyst Angel Hair dye by speaking to her while wearing it.+5

The Piratical JokersComplete all Commendations within this collection. (5)+25

Unlocks The Piratical Jokers Tattoo Set for purchase in Umbra's Tattoo Outlet.

The Pirate Scribes:

CommendationsImageCommendationRequirementsRewardsOne Cross PirateRumour says that there's a lot of undelivered mail left in some rubble on Sanctuary Outpost.+5

Points of ContentionOver at Port Merrick, Umbra heard of a pirate who loved to write down their thoughts.+5

Helping HandsFive names are scratched into a rock on Cannon Cove, found by walking inland from the dock.+5

See No Evil, Hear No Evil, Speak No EvilOn Sanctuary Outpost, this flag was raised whenever a pirate stepped out of line.+5

Scruffy ScribeA poetic pirate left a scruffy book inside a cave at Shark Bait Cove, beside a shrine.+5

The Pirate ScribesComplete all Commendations within this collection. (5)+25

Unlocks The Gift Givers Tattoo Set for purchase in Umbra's Tattoo Outlet.

The Gift Givers:

CommendationsImageCommendationRequirementsRewardsDelicious DeliveryThey say that an unusual merchant delivery ended up on the docks at Morrow's Peak.+5

May Contain BoomA pirate once made quite the bang over at Port Merrick, somewhere behind the shops...+5

Big Love in a Small PackageA parcel and hat on the dock at Galleon's Grave suggest that The Wilds may be civilised after all.+5

Putting the Ship in FriendshipAt The Finest Trading Post is a fine work of craftswomanship.+5

Charitable PiratingShow Umbra the Stream Sailor makeup by speaking to her while wearing it.+5

The Gift GiversComplete all Commendations within this collection. (5)+25

The Early Settlers:

CommendationsImageCommendationRequirementsRewardsWho's a Good Boy?On Galleon's Grave, high up on the wreck, there lived a dog of legendary adorableness.+5

Fool's GoldOn Cannon Cove, a pirate once thought outside the barrel when it came to making money.+5

Nesting SpotHigh as a Crow's Nest, at Crow's Nest Fortress...+5

Hallowed GroundStories abound of a pirate brazen enough to deface even the Ferry of the Damned!+5

Pirate Leg EndShow Umbra the Sea Dog Pegleg by speaking to her while wearing it.+5

The Early SettlersComplete all Commendations within this collection. (5)+25

Unlocks The Early Settlers Tattoo Set for purchase in Umbra's Tattoo Outlet.

General Sea of Legends:

CommendationsImageCommendationRequirementsRewardsChronicler of LegendUncover the Legends of the Sea for Umbra. (60)+50

Rewards the Chronicler of Legend Title.

Unlocks Umbra's Chronicle Tattoo Set for purchase in Umbra's Tattoo Outlet.

The Legend of Glitterbeard:
